title: CPC also increases fuel prices; petrol by Rs.84 & diesel by Rs. 113
body_lines: The Ceylon Petroleum Corporation has decided to increase the fuel prices with effect from midnight today.
A litre of Petrol 92 Octane has been increased by Rs. 84 while a litre of Petrol 95 Octane by Rs.90, a litre of Auto Diesel by Rs.113 and a litre of Super Diesel has been increased by Rs. 75.
Accordingly, the new price of a litre of Petrol Octane 92 is Rs. 338 and Octane 95 is Rs. 373. The price of a litre of Auto Diesel is Rs. 289 and litre of Super Diesel is Rs. 329.
Earlier, the LIOC increased the fuel prices and now both the CEYPETCO and the LIOC fuel prices stand equal. (Darshana Sanjeewa Balasuriya)
